source: 211 Connects Alabama, Alabama Department of Veterans Affairs, Priority Veteran, United Way of Central Alabama

resources.name: 211 Connects Alabama
resources.description: Searchable database of resources specifically for Veterans, Service Members and their families. Available 24/7 with trained operators.

resources.name: Priority Veteran
resources.description: Service-coordination program for homeless veterans helping them secure permanent, sustainable housing. Serves all Alabama except Baldwin and Mobile counties.

resources.name: Alabama Department of Veterans Affairs
resources.description: State department providing comprehensive veteran services including benefits, housing assistance, and homeless veterans programs

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line
resources.description: 24/7 free confidential crisis support for veterans and families experiencing mental health crises, PTSD, suicidal thoughts

resources.name: Homeless Veterans Initiative of Alabama
resources.description: Organization serving homeless veterans in Birmingham and Tuscaloosa areas with housing and support services

resources.name: Three Hots And A Cot
resources.description: Provides housing and meals for homeless veterans

resources.name: Aletheia House of Birmingham
resources.description: Offers job training and placement assistance, transitional housing with meals for veterans

resources.name: One Roof
resources.description: Veteran support services in Birmingham area

resources.name: Catholic Center of Concern
resources.description: Provides food boxes and emergency assistance for veterans

resources.name: United Way of Central Alabama - Veteran Services
resources.description: United Way veteran services providing referrals and support for veterans needing housing, employment, benefits assistance
